generated_body: In the article titled "Still teaching at 95, Jimmy Carter draws devotees to church," the user can expect to read about former President Jimmy Carter's ongoing involvement in his church community despite his advanced age. The piece is likely to detail his commitment to teaching and the impact he has on his congregation, highlighting how he continues to inspire devotion among attendees. Additionally, it may explore his life and contributions beyond his presidency, offering insights into how he maintains his health and resilience. There could also be reflections on his legacy and the significance of his faith in his later years.
